document.full_text: a man who tried to hijack a paris-rome flight sunday night and take it to libya was overpowered by cabin crew during the flight and arrested when the plane arrived in rome, officials said.
document.title: man who tried to hijack italian plane overpowered
lines_and_colors: a man who tried to hijack a paris-rome flight sunday night and take it to libya was overpowered by cabin crew during the flight and arrested when the plane arrived in rome, officials said.
